scripts.dev: concurrently -n server,web -c blue,green "npm run dev -w server" "npm run dev -w acadly-frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build -w server && npm run build -w acadly-frontend
scripts.start: concurrently -n server,web -c blue,green "npm start -w server" "npm run preview -w acadly-frontend"
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check -w server && npm run type-check -w acadly-frontend
